sentences.sContent: You should keep in with your colleagues.
sentences.sCn: 你应当与你的同事友好相处。

sentences.sContent: If you take this medicine,all your symptoms will fall away.
sentences.sCn: 如果你使用这种药物，你的所有症状将会消失。

trans.tranOther: used when speaking or writing to one or more people to show that something belongs to them or is connected with them
